comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I actually had some college friends from Intercourse. Which BTW, happens to be just down the road from Blue Ball, PA. No kidding. See ya'll at 12:10.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I would _hate_ living in Intercourse, PA! No thank you! DU Pussywillow Court Boulder, CO

comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
DU,

Only fitting it should be [you](http://www.flagstafffrenzy.org/wp-content/uploads/2009/03/good-show.jpg)! More importantly, the inanity of your comment is in perfect keeping with the Frenzy editorial standards these past four years!

Your prize: autographed and unwashed Bailey bike shorts.
